abilities.name: Into The Lamp

stats: This ability passes through non-God enemies, but stops on walls and enemy Gods

abilities.notes:
Notes:
Aladdin and the target have their health restored to a minimum amount. Aladdin's non-ultimate cooldowns are reset. The target's non-ultimate cooldowns are halved
The Lamp is left behind, allowing any god to enter the lamp and join the ongoing challenge
Damage dealt by the initial hit cannot bring enemies lower than the health they would be restored to and cannot trigger item effects
The fight lasts for 16 seconds, after which everyone is kicked out of the lamp. An escape lamp appears at 8 seconds into a fight
The escape can open early when either the main Aladdin and fight target (hereby referred to as combatants) die, or if only 1 team remains in the lamp.
Entering the lamp or leaving the lamp requires interacting with the lamp. This interaction takes 0.5 seconds and is interrupted by taking damage.
Non-combatants deal 10% reduced damage to and take 10% increased damage from combatants
If while a fight is active a different Aladdin brings a target into the lamp, they become the new combatants. The previous combatants are now treated as non-combatants and the arena resets its fight timer and closes the escape if it was active
Gods outside the lamp cannot target gods inside the lamp. Gods inside the lamp cannot target gods outside the lamp.
Being kicked out of the lamp interrupts any currently firing ability.
Gods will be returned to the original locations and camera rotations when leaving the lamp.
Recalling and Aladdin's A04 (Into the Lamp) are blocked from being used while inside the lamp
This ability passes through non-God enemies, but stops on walls and enemy Gods

abilities.name: Changeling

The Morrigan will copy all their abilities and active items, all with no cooldown. The Morrigan will copy their ability ranks. If her level is different to the transform target's it will use the order they ranked their abilities, filling with Auto Skill as needed. If The Morrigan is in the middle of firing an ability when the transform times out, she will detransform the moment that ability fire ends. The Morrigan retains her Jungle Buffs and Fire Giant buff while transformed, while also gaining the buffs that her transformation currently has. (excluding Elixir's, which she doesn't gain nor retain on transform.) The Morrigan can use the consumables of her selected Transformation, such as Wards, Runic Bomb, and Obsidian Dagger. Detransformation cleanses all currently applied Crowd Control effects, immediately causing The Morrigan to detransform. Transformation cleanses ALL effects, including allied ones such as Khepri's Ultimate, Scarab's Blessing. These effects are still applied to The Morrigan's base form, so if she dies while Blessed, she will immediately detransform and be revived.

abilities.name: Ullr Basic Attack
abilities.notes: Notes: Bow projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls. If axe cone area contains multiple enemies, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Expose Weakness/Invigorate
abilities.notes: Notes: The buff persists after switching stances.

abilities.name: Wield Axes/Wield Bow
abilities.notes: Notes: Ullr also gains half of the benefit of the opposing stance.

abilities.name: Vulcan Basic Attack
abilities.notes: Notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Backfire
abilities.notes: Notes:

abilities.name: Yemoja Basic Attack
abilities.notes: Notes: Projectile stops on the first target hit, and does not pass through walls. Yemoja basic attacks can hit allies with an increased radius, applying Omi Healing.

abilities.name: Omi
abilities.notes: Notes: Additional Omi is gained at levels 5, 10 and 15. Cooldown Reduction increase Omi regeneration.

abilities.name: Bouncing Bubble
abilities.notes: Notes: Enemies take reduced damage if hit by both large bubbles. All Allies hit will also gain Omi Healing. This ability changes to Moonstrike when used.

abilities.name: Moonstrike
abilities.notes: Notes: Enemy structures hit by the final strike are stunned for 2s. This ability changes to Bouncing Bubble when used.

abilities.name: Mending Waters
abilities.notes: Notes: Projectile stops on walls or first allied gods. Allies hit will also gain Omi Healing.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.notes: Notes: Allies that use the ring also gain Omi Healing.

abilities.name: River's Rebuke
abilities.notes: Notes: Enemies are slowed by 60%, decreasing to normal over 2s. Yemoja gains half of her missing Omi immediately but the duration of regeneration buff is decreased based on the amount restored.

abilities.name: Ymir Basic Attack
abilities.notes: Notes: If multiple enemies are in the area, the enemy closest to the center of the area will be hit.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.notes: Notes: Frostbite's effect stacks with Critical Strikes.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.notes: Notes: The Wall Impedes all characters. Create a Wall at your feet to Displace yourself up and forward. Displaces enemies up and away from the Wall. Reactivate to destroy the Wall early.

abilities.name: Glacial Strike
abilities.notes: Notes: Damaging area starts at Ymir and moves away over time. You are Slowed by 42.5% during activation.

abilities.name: Frost Breath
abilities.notes: Notes: You are Rooted during activation.

abilities.name: Shards of Ice
abilities.notes: Notes: Damage scales linearly from 35% + 0.03% Intelligence to 100% based on Channel time. Max Channel time of 3 seconds. You are Rooted while Channeling.

abilities.name: Zeus Basic Attack
abilities.notes: Notes: Projectile stops on first target hit, and does not pass through walls.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.notes: Notes: Projectile stops on walls.

abilities.name: Detonate Charge
abilities.notes: Notes: This ability cannot be activated unless an enemy has a Charge. Damage is multiplied by 1/1.7/2.4 based on the number of Charges.
